reviews.review: Это топ 1 турнир снг нада стараца

CS:GO Experience in a nutshell: spent 400 euro on cases got nothing, 2. entered mm played against cheaters, lost the game, played another mm game 1 left at the beginning of the match; another one was afk for most of the rounds and at the end started blocking and team flashing, 3rd teammate was toxic and 4th was also afk, after 20 rounds they kicked me and i got a cooldown. For all the beginners out there I will give u a tip: DONT PLAY THIS GAME AND ESPECIALLY DO NOT SPEND MONEY ON IT, and if you cant resist playing then at least play faceit!!!
Full with cheaters, very toxic playerbase and I never connect with other Europeans, just fucking Russians and other third world countries...
It is so much outdated and has so many weird game mechanics and design decisions, that I don't have a clue how come people still play it. So much conservatism.
